feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Single user column type by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13543
  • Clean BBReferenceProcessor code by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13603
  • Fix filtering by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13615
  • Googlesheets user fixes by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13620
  • Fix user relationship to user column migration by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13594
  • Allow Fancy Input validation to be triggered onBlur by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13658
  • Fix tests depending on date by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13668
  • Deleting a column on google spreadsheet messes with the data by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13652
  • Fixing issue with grid not allowing copying external ID by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13650
  • Updating binding tests to test single column by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13656
  • Fix binding panel by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13669
  • [Feat] Single user column by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13604
  • Fix Collapsed Component Tree Not Expanding When a New Component Is Added Within It by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13628
  • Added changelog links to portal help section and version update modal by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.25.0...2.26.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused dependencies packages by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13584
  • Fixing AUTOMATION_THREAD_TIMEOUT environment variable by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13670

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.0...2.26.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Selected row + export data support for grid blocks (new table component) by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13426
  • Read me translations by @TheoDelaporte in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13525
  • Fix null dereference error when selected cell ID is undefined by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13672
  • Fix for positioning of selected builder navigation tab on page load by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13636
  • Fixes for update row action in automations and attachments by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13676

New Contributors

  • @TheoDelaporte made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13525

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.1...2.26.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update googlesheets npm package by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13681
  • Fix schema generation for external tables with view_ in their name by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13682
  • Update naming of some data types and update order by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13687
  • Fix - user must be of type string by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13688
  • Fix: Only show free trial banner/modal to account owner by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13692

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.2...2.26.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Quick fix for worker/server tests expecting missing messaging by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13693
  • Add support for file uploads with custom S3 endpoints by @CSLTech in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13395
  • Handle invalid content-dispositions, still allow REST download by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13694
  • remove file size limit on self host by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13696
  • Edit app metadata UX updates. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13685
  • Fix JSON error when editing rows in modal that contain unset attachment fields by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13698

New Contributors

  • @CSLTech made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.3...2.26.4
